name: .WLT
summary: Learn about .WLT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: To use a WLT file as a Unity window layout, you must place the file in Unity's Layouts directory. This directory is located in different places in different versions of Unity, but is always a subdirectory of the Unity directory. After you place your WLT file in Unity's Layouts directory, you should be able to select it from Unity's Layout dropdown menu.
